To start the game, deal 12 cards\nby tapping on the deck in the top\nright corner of the screen.
The objective of this game is to find as many valid Sets as possible. A valid Set consists of three cards with special properties as explained below.
The game is played with 81 cards. Each card has four properties which can have three values each:

Color: red, green or blue
Shape: clubs, hearts or diamonds
Number: one, two or three
Filling: empty, half or full
A valid Set consists of three cards which are either all equal or all different in each of these four properties. This is an example of a valid Set.
This is not a valid Set, because two of these cards are green and one is blue. The tutorial can help you learn how to recognize valid Sets.
If you have found a valid Set, press this button and select the three cards you found. Then press the button again to confirm.
If you cannot find any valid Sets, press this button to deal three additional cards. Up to 21 cards can be in the game at the same time. 21 cards always contain at least one valid Set.
